name: Spaciez
description:
This game was made by students from Sweden and the Netherlands during the International Educations Game Jam.

"Spaciez" is a point-and-click adventure game in space. Your spacestation is falling apart after a virus is released and turns all of the crew members into zombies! Use your jetpack to move around, evade or eliminate the zombies by using the trail of fire behind you. Just remember to keep an eye on the fuel bar. You can refuel against the walls or by eliminating more zombies!

Features 

- Move around in zero gravity - 5 different rooms - Eliminate zombies with your jetpack - Easy for everyone to play with point-and-click - Re-playability with a highscore system -Option to put your face on an astronaut with webcam feature 

Credits Team 24

Programming
